title: The Adventures of Victor Foster: The Mind Master

story.text: Victor Foster discovers he has the ability to influence people's thoughts after a mysterious comet passes over his city. He uses this new power to defuse a heated argument at the university.
Excited by his abilities, Victor decides to master his skills. He spends the day reading on human psychology and neurology, finding ways to enhance his persuasion.
His powers grow stronger. He helps a tutor persuade reluctant students to take their studies seriously, leading to a noticeable improvement in their grades.
Victor begins to question the ethics of his actions. He consults his mentor, Dr. Helms, who advises him on the importance of consent and moral integrity in using such powers.
Using his powers for good, Victor volunteers at a counseling center, subtly guiding troubled youth towards making better decisions without overtly controlling their thoughts.

A local gang leader learns of Victor’s abilities and attempts to coerce him into manipulating a political figure. Victor outsmarts the leader, using his persuasion to lead the gang to surrender themselves to the police.
Victor reflects on the week's events and decides to use his powers primarily for educational and therapeutic purposes, vowing to respect the free will of others.

ending: Victor realized that great power truly comes with great responsibility.
moral: The true test of one’s character is not how they handle power, but how they handle the responsibility that comes with it.
